exceptions.exn: The LHS of Riemann_sum_opp (Riemann_sum (fun x : R => opp (_ x)) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V a, b : R n : nat H : forall (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum (fun x : R => opp (f x)) ptd = opp (Riemann_sum f ptd) Unable to unify "opp (RInt_val f (- a) (- b) n)" with "opp (RInt_val (fun x : R => f (- x)) b a n)".
